entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this morning. Showers or drizzle beginning early this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
